description: Validation rules for product color names

error_messages.MISSING_VALUE: Color name is missing. All products must have a valid color.
error_messages.INVALID_TYPE: Color name must be a text value. Found: {actual}.
error_messages.EMPTY_COLOR: Empty color name is not allowed.
error_messages.WHITESPACE_ERROR: Color name contains leading or trailing whitespace: '{original}'.
error_messages.SPECIAL_CHARACTERS: Color name '{color}' contains invalid special characters.
error_messages.NUMERIC_ONLY: Color name cannot be purely numeric: '{color}'.

validation_rules.name: non_color_descriptor
validation_rules.description: Check for size or quantity descriptors in color field

validation_rules.name: numeric_only
validation_rules.description: Check for purely numeric color names
